title: Wyverní maso
content:
Maso vyrvané upírovi.

Wyverní maso – These steaks are harvested from the remains of wyvern a královská wyverna, making them skinnable items, but since they have no alchemical value, they are not considered ingredients. They are considered jídlo.

Cena
 Nákup	Prodej
25  	5  




Lokace
Wyverní ostrov
Pole
road from the Bahnice a Břeh
near místa moci near that same corpse on the road
Ostrov Černého Rybáka
Poznámky
Wyverna a královská wyverna remains contain these with or without their bestiary entries.
Hostinský na Nový Narakort is willing to buy three of these as per Zakázka: wyverny
They are also much appreciated by the hladovějící elfové v Bahnice
Vaska will buy these
